visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and include other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specified colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents months with labels styled in a dark gray color and a font size of 12px, while the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters with similar styling. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data, with a custom color of green. The chart also includes additional configurations such as margins, background color, and legend settings to enhance readability and visual appeal.
